titles.title: For the relief of Hilario Armijo, Timothy W. Armijo, Josephine and Mike Baca, Vincent Chavez, David Chinana, Victor Chinana, Ivan T. Gachupin, Michael Gachupin, Frank Madalena, Jr., Dennis Magdalena, Mary Pecos, Lawrence Seonia, Roberta P. Toledo, Nathaniel Tosa, Allen L. Toya, Jr., Ethel Waquie, and Veronica Waquie.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/21/1998--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums, out of amounts not otherwise appropriated, to certain named individuals in New Mexico.
